main event: Two pilots observed a green flare descending at a steep angle while flying in formation on January 30, 1951.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at approximately 41,000 feet altitude,The flare appeared to be fired from a 'Very' flare pistol type device,The pilots observed the flare about 100 to 200 yards off their left wing,The flare dissipated at approximately 25,000 feet,Both pilots were in complete agreement about the details of the observation.
